title: Investment Risk Assessment
description: This questionnaire will help us understand your investment goals and risk tolerance to create a personalized portfolio recommendation.

sections.title: Financial Goals & Time Horizon
sections.description: Understanding your investment goals and timeline helps us match your portfolio to your needs.

sections.title: Financial Situation
sections.description: Your current financial position affects how much risk is appropriate for you.

sections.title: Risk Capacity
sections.description: This measures your ability to withstand market fluctuations and potential losses.

sections.title: Risk Attitude
sections.description: Your personal comfort level with investment risk and market volatility.

sections.title: Investment Experience & Preferences
sections.description: Your familiarity with different investment types and management style.

questions.text: What is your primary investment objective?

options.text: Grow my capital steadily over time
Maximize long-term returns, accepting short-term risk

questions.text: When do you expect to start withdrawing a significant portion of this investment?
How would you describe your household income stability?
Do you have a financial safety net (e.g., emergency fund, insurance)?
How would you react if your portfolio lost 15% in six months?

options.text: Sell immediately to avoid further losses
Buy more to take advantage of lower prices

questions.text: What is the maximum annual loss you could tolerate without changing your investment plan?
When markets are volatile, what is your typical reaction?

options.text: I monitor closely but avoid changing plans
I stay calm or see it as an opportunity

questions.text: How do you feel about investment risk?

options.text: I avoid it as much as possible
I can handle some risk for moderate returns
I am comfortable with high risk for high potential returns

questions.text: Which investments have you used before?

options.text: Only savings, fixed deposits, or insurance

questions.text: How actively do you manage your investments?

options.text: I rarely review or adjust them
I actively manage and adjust strategies
